channel.title: Making Your Own Promo Graphics
channel.description:
I wrote a blog post about the process of creating some promotional graphics for the [Lessonator Mac app][1], which I released this past week.
Whether or not you're into art, it's always fun to see how marketing, coding and art meet & overlap.
Let me know what you think...
http://entrepreneurbydesign.wordpress.com/2013/12/22/designing-the-year-of-lessonator-promo/
[1]: http://lessonator.com

item.title: Making Your Own Promo Graphics
item.dc:creator: anon3850446
item.description:
I wrote a blog post about the process of creating some promotional graphics for the Lessonator Mac app, which I released this past week.

Whether or not you’re into art, it’s always fun to see how marketing, coding and art meet & overlap.

Let me know what you think…

Entrepreneur By Design – 22 Dec 13

Designing The “Year Of Lessonator” Promo

This past week, I finally released Lessonator version 1.0. One interesting aspect of that release is the promotional material I had to develop for it. Lessonator is a 100% bootstrapped venture, whi…
